The small group of Decepticons could have almost cheered when they�d gotten 
a reply to their message.

It could have been from a rescue ship that was just passing by. Since none 
of their scanners worked due to the crash.
It could have come from anywhere.
They couldn�t tell.
But at least they would no longer be stranded out in the middle of nowhere 
in need of repairs.

Sand Storm was nearly dancing.
� Now we can get out of this harsh weather!� he laughed.
Dark Cloud just stood there silently as Blue Flame gave a long sigh of 
relief.
Diesel Runner, however, had a weary look on her face-plate.
That transmission had been to clear to have been from outer space. It must 
of come from some where in the planet.
Did this mean that there were other transformers here?
